content: * please note this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free version on my blog www theturtletrunk com * the bonfire blanket is perfect for this fall and winter season it s features beautiful texture fun stripes and twisted fringe this pattern is easy to work up and uses a simple two stripe repeat it s easy enough that you don t have to focus too hard but it s interesting enough so you won t get bored finished size 60 x 45 without the fringe difficulty advanced beginner / easy standard us crochet terms pattern includes - detailed written instructions - instructions on adjusting blanket size - gauge pattern - link to the free video tutorial - special stitch instructions with photos - photos for reference - how to make twisted fringe supplies needed medium 4 weight yarn 6 50mm k hook yarn needle scissors and tape measure
